lead_paragraph: Juventus have signed Argentina striker Gonzalo Higuain from Napoli for 90 million euros (75.25 million pounds), the third highest transfer fee ever paid.

headline.print_headline: Juventus Sign Higuain for 90 Million Euros
headline.main: Juventus Sign Higuain for 90 Million Euros
